subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson, who has focused on improving as a person as well as a golfer, shot a three-under 69 to hold off Jordan Spieth and win the Masters for a second time.
snippet: Bubba Watson, who has focused on improving as a person as well as a golfer, shot a three-under 69 to hold off Jordan Spieth and win the Masters for a second time.
